attributes.action: Change Nelson Road in Fleetwood to Uwe Avenue
attributes.background: In light of Fleetwood recent success would like to rename Nelson road in Fleetwood as Uwe Acenue

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Changing local road names would be the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
